title: Xiaomi India head Manu Kumar Jain promoted to Global Vice President
text:
Xiaomi India head Manu Kumar Jain promoted to Global Vice President Xiaomi India head Manu Kumar Jain promoted to Global Vice President By - February 17, 2017 “Jain joined Xiaomi as the India head in May 2014, and will continue to oversee Indian operations as its MD” 
Last month, after a three-year stint with Xiaomi, Hugo Barra resigned from his post as the Global Vice President of the brand. Now, Xiaomi India head Manu Kumar Jain has taken his place as the brand’s global VP. @manukumarjain , congratulations from the entire Xiaomi family on your promotion to Vice President of Xiaomi! pic.twitter.com/gxc1mfwPIK — Mi India (@XiaomiIndia) February 17, 2017 
Jain joined the company as the India head in May 2014, and will continue to oversee India operations as its Managing Director. Xiaomi India tweeted, “@manukumarjain, congratulations from the entire Xiaomi family on your promotion to Vice President of Xiaomi!” Jain replied to this tweet, “Thank You my phenomenal @xiaomi @XiaomiIndia family! I am so glad I got the opportunity to work with the best team on the planet.” 
Jain promotion as global VP comes at a time when the brand has seen great success in the Indian market. According to IDC, Xiaomi became the second-largest smartphone vendor in India in the fourth quarter of last year. The brand’s Redmi 3S series of smartphones have been a major contributer to its success in the country. Facebook Comments
